title: Teen Boys & Video Games
itunes:author: Guest: Jonathan McKee
itunes:summary:
A common question parents of teen boys will ask is, "Should I let my son play video games?" John and Danny offer some help to parents whose sons are playing too many video games. Featuring Jonathan McKee.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive Jonathan's book "The Guy's Guide to Four Battles Every Young Man Must Face" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-02-22?refcd=1317406

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/teen-boys-video-games/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
